Otherwise we will change the item. We will send the defect item to the manufacturer where it will be repaired. Afterwards we will test it and send it to you. If the period for the repair is too long, we will contact you and agree if you can keep the new item. Thank you for your understanding, that we are only able to change and repair items, when there is definitly a defect. Otherwise we have to charge you for all costs.
